已更新164最终版并简单修正替换下语言文件。

1.7.10当前最新版....且为alpha版目前已是beta版，看来正式版不远了~，汉化修正过后看情况再做。
Beta versions, possibly buggy!
TConstruct (Content!) - 1.6.0d40.1
Mantle (Required Coremod) - 0.3.1

http://pan.baidu.com/s/1o63DXd4
感谢@Mrkwtkr 提供宝典部分汉化~

附属机械机关类MOD




C9BUGwv.png (351.81 KB, 下载次数: 2865)

下载附件

2014-8-12 02:22 上传





Mechworks - 0.2.8 需求上面两个mod，建议一块使用！
注意，高级建桥器可能会导致游戏崩溃，请禁用之！！

其他附属MOD for 1.7
Iguanas Tinker Tweaks
Extra TiC - Metallurgy support
TiC Tooltips
AOBD

PS：说作者突然下放172版本的出来，我保证不打死你 {:10_498:}
既然执意要172那就放个链接好了。http://www.9minecraft.net/tinkers-construct-mod/
作者之所以在原帖没有再次下放172是因为这个版本的bug很多易崩，也懒得搭理，在172上出现任何问题都不会有修复改动，用还是不用请自行权衡。关于172 作者原话
1.7.2 Downloads
Not supported at all. Enjoy.
TConstruct - Download, Alternate
Mantle - Download, Alternate

Why are these links hilarious?

I do not want to support 1.7.2. It's an outdated version of MInecraft with a bunch of rendering problems that were fixed in the very next patch, yet Forge was stuck on it for 8 months. The difference between the recommended and the latest version of Forge is large enough that it breaks a good deal of mods, the recommended version has the ore dictionary backwards compared to every other version, and there have been many other things that break mods throughout the time Forge spent on 1.7.2I was planning on leaving well enough alone. The sheer number of people asking where 1.7.2 is, why it's not supported, and demanding backports was too much. The current links are for my sanity; the alternative is to report every single person that merely asks where 1.7.2 is as asking for backports.Besides, the 1.7.2 versions of TConstruct are full of memory leaks. Do you really want buggy mods that will eventually crash your game?

比较厉害的mod，可通过冶炼、制模、灌注、搭配材料组合打造富有特色的工具！（打造工具方式倒是跟群峦有点点相似）
从这里开始你的工匠之路吧！

官方汉化已跟进的差不多，这里就不做修正补充直接搬了~

1.5.1RC2完善汉化文本，有错误、不准确的地方请指明。
作者的附属MOD —— TMechworks ，是基于TC的一个小mod，包含几种比较屌的机关方块，强烈建议一并安装！

LZ你这版本汉化组出了个问题，就是合成任何部件都会显示%%
这是由于汉化组误把%%material 后面的“material”删除，导致游戏无法认出造成的
这里有个个人修复版，望LZ采纳
